quest.main.cure.infection.title: Unavoidable Infection
quest.main.cure.infection.subtitle: One bite is all it takes… well, maybe a couple.
quest.main.cure.infection.description_1: All zombies have the ability to §cinfect§r their victims upon making contact during an attack.
quest.main.cure.infection.description_2: The infection progresses slowly through multiple stages. Letting it take over will result in your character becoming a zombie.
quest.main.cure.infection.description_3: Certain armor types can negate this effect.
quest.main.cure.goldenapple.title: Curing the Infection
quest.main.cure.goldenapple.subtitle: An apple a day keeps the zombies away.
quest.main.cure.goldenapple.description_: The only cure for the infection is by eating §bgolden apples§r.
As they cannot be easily crafted, you will have to loot them from §bmedical buildings§r.
quest.main.cure.beginning.title: The Beginning
quest.main.cure.beginning.subtitle: Once Upon a Time...
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_1: Many thought it would take longer for society to collapse. That they would have months to prepare, or at least a few weeks to find shelter.
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_2: Instead, it happened almost overnight. People turned on the streets, in their homes, in their shelters —  seemingly at random for no reason at all.
quest.main.cure.beginning.description_3: Those that did not soon found themselves wishing they had. §oPerhaps your fate will be different?§r
quest.main.cure.basic.title: Understanding the Basics
quest.main.cure.basic.subtitle: Hunting for the Truth
quest.main.cure.basic.description_1: Quick as the infection was, a §bcure§r had been made and was being distributed at the moment of the collapse.
quest.main.cure.basic.description_2: Its method of manufacture is beyond your capability right now, but it wouldn't hurt to have a good stockpile in case of the worst.
quest.main.cure.basic.description_3: At the moment,  your best shot of getting your hands on the cure would be finding it at §bmedical facilities§r.
quest.main.cure.info_school.title: Gather Research - §aVertical School§r
quest.main.cure.info_school.description_: A group of students claim to have rediscovered the method for recreating the cure, but contact with them was lost soon after.
If what they say is true, the research papers should be in the Vertical School's chemistry lab.
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.title: Gather Research - §aTerrace Plaza Mall§r
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.description_1: There are rumors that some scientists managed to take refuge in the Terrace Plaza Mall, one of the largest malls in the city.
quest.main.cure.info_plaza.description_2: You may be able to get information on the cure from them... or loot it from where they died.
quest.main.cure.info_courtyard.title: Gather Research - §aCourtyard Office§r
quest.main.cure.info_courtyard.descripti: The Courtyard Office towers above even the skyscrapers of the highrise office district.
Intel suggests a high-ranking office worker staying there has come into possession of research on the cure.
quest.main.cure.info_casino.title: Gather Research - §aCasino§r
quest.main.cure.info_casino.description_: Rumors suggest a key piece of the cure research is up for for sale at the Casino, one of the world’s tallest buildings and every gambler’s favorite place.
Take it for yourself, or find someone who knows where it is.
quest.main.cure.info_lab.title: Gather Research - §aLaboratory§r
quest.main.cure.info_lab.description_1: Visit the laboratory and uncover the secrets behind the outbreak. Rumors claim that one of the key ingredients for the cure was produced here.
quest.main.cure.info_lab.description_2: If there is any research on the cure at all, it will definitely be found in here.
quest.main.cure.catalog.title: The Catalog
quest.main.cure.catalog.subtitle: A Brief History of the Cure
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_1: The papers you’ve collected tell a tale you probably already know too well — a cure was made, but multiple factors made it too difficult to produce in amounts large enough before the inevitable happened.
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_2: One of those factors was the availability of a reagent called the §bX Factor§r, which the papers say contains materials that do not originate from this dimension.
quest.main.cure.catalog.description_3: Combining your newfound understanding of the process with that reagent should finally allow you to recreate the cure.
quest.main.cure.precursor.title: The Precursor
quest.main.cure.precursor.subtitle: Not Quite Chemical X
quest.main.cure.precursor.description_1: With both the research book and the X Factor, you are finally ready to take on the challenge of manufacturing the cure.
quest.main.cure.precursor.description_2: Automate it if you wish, or just make one trial run — the choice is yours.
quest.main.cure.cure.title: The Cure
quest.main.cure.cure.subtitle: The Scenic Route
quest.main.cure.cure.description_1: Combine Formula X with an ordinary apple to make a golden apple.
quest.main.cure.cure.description_2: If you’ve successfully automated things up to this point, congratulations — humanity has regained its ability to make a cure for the infection!
quest.main.cure.cure.description_3: However… is this really the end?
quest.main.cure.gasmask.title: Seeking the Source
quest.main.cure.gasmask.subtitle: The Long Journey
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_1: Rumors say that the outbreak came from another world, the portal hidden an a lab deep in what is now a radioactive wasteland… but a long journey lies ahead.
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_2: Craft a gas mask, or find one in hospitals — but beware, as they will only last so long.
quest.main.cure.gasmask.description_3: It’s recommended to bring extra filters for your mask, as you can right-click them while wearing it to repair.
quest.main.cure.find_wasteland.title: The Wasteland
quest.main.cure.find_wasteland.descripti: The source of the apocalypse, the Wasteland is all that remains after both being overrun by infected and the catastrophic meltdown of its many nuclear reactors.
Find the laboratory at the heart of it all, and uncover its secrets...
quest.main.cure.x_factor.title: The X Factor
quest.main.cure.x_factor.subtitle: *buzzer noise*
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_1: After the cure was created, many laboratories banded together in hopes of finding a way to speed up the painfully slow production process.
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_2: Though their efforts came too late to save themselves, it seems their work was not in vain.
quest.main.cure.x_factor.description_3: While the method of making more of this reagent is now locked behind a deactivated portal, there should be enough of it left here to finish the cure — if you have the proper knowledge.
quest.main.abyss.keycard.title: The Keycard
quest.main.abyss.keycard.subtitle: The Key to the Unknown
quest.main.abyss.keycard.description_1:
It was all over the news when the creation of the gateway was completed. A new world, ripe for the picking, just waiting for the next wave of pioneers. 
The beginning of the end, though they could not have known it.
quest.main.abyss.keycard.description_2: The gateway at the heart of the lab now lies shut, and requires an activation key.
quest.main.abyss.origin.title: The Origin
quest.main.abyss.origin.subtitle: Darker Darker Yet Darker
quest.main.abyss.origin.description_1: It is time to traverse the gateway.
quest.main.abyss.origin.description_2: Use the magnetic card on the portal.
quest.main.district.radar.title: Building Radar
quest.main.district.radar.subtitle: DeceasedCraft's most awaited feature...
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_1: Not sure what building you're at? Or want to find a specific building?
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_2: Craft or find a §bbuilding radar§r and charge it. You can charge it with a battery, or a charging station.
quest.main.district.radar.title.desc_3: §cWARNING:§r Be aware that searching for buildings may cause lag as new chunks are generated!
quest.main.district.survivor_radar.title: Survivor Radar
quest.main.district.survivor_radar.desc_: Villagers in DeceasedCraft v5.0 have been §cremoved§r in favour of special quest NPCs.
There are several per district, and completing their quests will allow you to purchase items from them.
NPCs can be found with the §bsurvivor radar§r, and active NPC quests can be tracked using §6[F8]§r.
quest.main.district.suburb_residential.d: A peaceful neighbourhood of small suburban houses. §aMild§r tempreature. §aLow§r threat. Your default spawn location.
quest.main.district.highrise_office.desc: A crowded district full of medium to highrise offices. §eModerate threat§r. §6Heat§r protection recommended.
quest.main.district.highrise_hotel.title: Highrise Hotel District
quest.main.district.highrise_hotel.descr: An entertainment district dominated by hotels and club venues, crowned by a megatall casino. §cHigh§r threat. §6Very hot§r!
quest.main.district.highrise_residential: A crowded highrise residential district. §eModerate§r threat. §bCold§r protection recommended.
quest.main.district.retail.title: Retail District
quest.main.district.retail.description: A sprawling retail district, the largest of which is the Terrace Plaza Mall. §cHigh§r threat. §bVery cold§r!
quest.main.district.wasteland.title: Wasteland
quest.main.district.wasteland.descriptio: A deadly, desolate district ravaged by both a nuclear reactor meltdown and the viral outbreak. §4Extreme§r threat. §4Extreme§r heat.
A gas mask or radiation protection suit is strongly recommended before entering this district.
